entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who has just fallen into a playground. He is described as diving headlong into sunlight.

entities.name: playground
entities.description: A nearly deserted playground where Harry finds himself. It is dominated by a single huge chimney in the distant skyline.

entities.name: chimney
entities.description: A huge chimney that dominates the distant skyline of the playground.

entities.name: girls
entities.description: Two girls who are swinging backward and forward in the playground. One is younger than the other.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A skinny boy with black hair, watching the girls from behind a clump of bushes. He looks no more than nine or ten years old and has undisguised greed in his thin face.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: One of the two girls who are swinging in the playground. She is younger than her sister and lets go of the swing at its highest arc.

relationships.description: Harry finds himself in the playground, which he has just fallen into.
Snape is watching the two girls swinging in the playground with undisguised greed in his thin face.
Lily is on the swing, which she lets go of at its highest arc.
